price: Dhugumatti, irra hedduu isaanii jechi (adabbiin) irratti mirkanaa’era; isaan hin amananu.
arabic: لَقَدۡ حَقَّ ٱلۡقَوۡلُ عَلَىٰٓ أَكۡثَرِهِمۡ فَهُمۡ لَا يُؤۡمِنُونَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: laqad ḥaqqa al-qawlu ʿalā aktharihim fahum lā yu'minūna
